assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shandong Nanshan Aluminium Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, imports, sells, and exports aluminum profiles worldwide. The company offers upstream products power, alumina, downstream products, extruded materials, and rolled materials, as well as aluminum alloy ingots, materials, and parts for automobiles; and automotive sheets, aviation sheets, and power battery foils. It also engages in the development of building curtain walls, discs, short shaft forgings, battery aluminum foils, aluminum alloy hot rolled coils, metallurgical grade alumina, and aluminum plates; sale of non-ferrous metal alloys, metal functional materials, deep-processed products, textiles, clothing, furniture, building materials, and chemical products; and laboratory testing of materials and their products, as well as research and development of resource recycling technology. Further, it engages in the research and development, production, and sales of aviation and aerospace parts and components; research, design, preparation, heat treatment, simulation analysis, industrial design, and technical services of light alloy materials; and metal scrap and scrap processing. The company's products are used for processing aviation sheets, automotive sheets, aluminum materials for new energy vehicles, high-speed trains, railway freight trains, medium and heavy plates for ships, tank cars, box cars, urban subways, passenger cars, power pipe rods, aluminum foil blanks, high-grade aluminum-plastic composite panel, power battery foil, food flexible packaging, cigarette packaging, pharmaceutical packaging, air-conditioning foil, can material, high-grade PS plate base, curtain wall, aluminum alloy doors and windows, containers and large mechanical structural parts, etc. The company was formerly known as Shandong Nanshan Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Nanshan Aluminium Co.,Ltd. in March 2006. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Longkou, China.
